spell_tooltip.description: Encircle enemy players with Bonds of Fel. If any affected player leaves the 8 yd radius they explode, dealing 704,989 Fire damage split amongst all nearby enemies.

Fracture the soul of up to 3 target players within 20 yds into the shadows, reducing their damage done by 25% and healing received by 25% for 8 sec. Souls are fractured up to 20 yds from the player's location.

Players can retrieve their souls to remove this effect.
Reduces the cast time of your Call Dreadstalkers, Summon Vilefiend, and Summon Demonic Tyrant by 15% and reduces the cooldown of Call Dreadstalkers by 5 sec.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.
All single-target damage done by you and your minions grants you and your pet shadowy shields that absorb 3% of the damage dealt, up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.2% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 90%.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

Curse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Curse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Summons a Demonic Circle for 15 min. Cast Demonic Circle: Teleport to teleport to its location and remove all movement slowing effects.

You also learn:

 Demonic Circle: Teleport
Teleports you to your Demonic Circle and removes all movement slowing effects.
Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for 3 sec and healing you for 20% of maximum health.
Stamina increased by 10%.
Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%.
Increases the damage done by your primary pet by 5%.
Increases you and your pets' maximum health by 5%.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional 10% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.
Sacrifices 20% of your current health to shield you for 200% of the sacrificed health plus an additional 229,745 for 20 sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.
Unending Resolve reduces damage taken by an additional 15%.
Stuns all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Dark Pact by 15 sec.
Wild Imp damage increased by 40%.
Shadow Bolt damage increased by 15%.

Your spells have a 5% increased chance to deal a critical strike.

You gain 10% more of the Critical Strike stat from all sources.
Soul Leech also heals you for 15% and your pet for 100% of the absorption it grants.
20% of all damage you take is taken by your demon pet instead.

Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

 Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 35% health. 60 sec cooldown.
Every Soul Shard you spend has a 5% chance to be refunded.

Consumes a Soul Shard, unlocking the hidden power of your spells.

Demonic Circle: Teleport: Increases your movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.

Demonic Gateway: Can be cast instantly.

Drain Life: Gain an absorb shield equal to the amount of healing done for 30 sec. This shield cannot exceed 30% of your maximum health.

Health Funnel: Restores 140% more health and reduces the damage taken by your pet by 30% for 10 sec.

Healthstone: Increases the healing of your Healthstone by 30% and increases your maximum health by 20% for 12 sec.

Grants access to the following abilities:

 Demonbolt
Send the fiery soul of a fallen demon at the enemy, causing 293,862 Shadowflame damage.

Generates 2 Soul Shards.

 Demonic Core
When your Wild Imps expend all of their energy or are imploded, you have a 10% chance to absorb their life essence, granting you a stack of Demonic Core. 

When your summoned Dreadstalkers fade away, you have a 100% chance to absorb their life essence, granting you a stack of Demonic Core.

Demonic Core reduces the cast time of Demonbolt by 100%. Maximum 4 stacks.
Demonic forces suck all of your Wild Imps toward the target, and then cause them to violently explode, dealing 71,104 Shadowflame damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Summons 2 ferocious Dreadstalkers to attack the target for 12 sec.
Implosion deals 10% increased damage. Consuming a Demonic Core has a chance to summon a Wild Imp.
When your Dreadstalkers charge into battle, their Dreadbite attack now hits all targets within 8 yards and deals 10% more damage.
Your Dreadstalkers' attacks have a 10% chance to trigger an additional Dreadbite.
You passively summon a Wild Imp to fight for you every 12 sec.

Teaches your primary Felguard the following ability:

 Soul Strike
Strike into the soul of the enemy, dealing 76,091 Shadow damage.

Generates 1 Soul Shard.
Infuse your Felguard with demonic strength and command it to charge your target and unleash a Felstorm that will deal 300% increased damage.

Increases all damage done by your pet by 4%.

Reduces the cast time of Shadow Bolt by 25% and increases its damage by 40%.
Soul Strike deals 20% increased damage and generates a Soul Shard.
Your Felguard deals 20% more damage and takes 10% less damage.
Bilescourge Bombers deal 20% increased damage, and your spells now have a chance to summon a Bilescourge Bomber.
Dreadbite causes the target to take 20% additional Shadowflame damage from your spell and abilities for the next 12 sec.
Instantly sacrifice up to 2 Wild Imps, generating 2 charges of Demonic Core that cause Demonbolt to deal 30% additional damage.

Summon a Demonic Tyrant to increase the duration of your Dreadstalkers, Vilefiend, Felguard, and up to 15 of your Wild Imps by 15 sec. Your Demonic Tyrant increases the damage of affected demons by 15%, while damaging your target.

Summons a Felguard who attacks the target for 17 sec that deals 125% increased damage.

This Felguard will stun and interrupt their target when summoned.
When your Wild Imps expire or die, your other demons are inspired and gain 1% additional damage, stacking up to 10 times.
Summon Demonic Tyrant empowers 5 additional Wild Imps and deals 10% increased damage for each demon he empowers.
Shadow Bolt and Demonbolt have a 20% chance to make your next Call Dreadstalkers cost 2 fewer Soul Shards and have no cast time.

When Demonbolt consumes a Demonic Core it inflicts impending doom upon the target, dealing 338,854 Shadow damage to enemies within 10 yds of its target after 20 sec or when removed. Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.

Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan reduces the duration of Doom by 1 sec.
Summon a Vilefiend to fight for you for the next 15 sec.
Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan increases the damage of your next Call Dreadstalkers by 2%.
Increases the damage of Doom by 30% and Doom summons 1 Wild Imp when it expires.
Increases Vilefiend damage by 20% and your Vilefiend's Bile Spit now applies Wicked Maw.
Your Dreadstalkers deal 50% increased damage while your Vilefiend is active.
When Doom expires, you have a chance to summon a Doomguard that casts 5 Doom Bolts before departing. Each Doom Bolt deals 277,201 Shadow damage.
Wicked Maw causes the target to take 20% additional Shadow damage from your demons.

Your Summon Vilefiend becomes Summon Charhound and learns the following ability:

 Infernal Presence
Cloaked in the ever-burning flames of the abyss, dealing 15,053 Fire damage to enemies within 10 yards every 0.8 sec.
Increases the attack speed of your Dreadstalkers by 10% and their critical strike chance by 15%.

Spending a Soul Shard on a damaging spell grants Diabolic Ritual for 20 sec. While Diabolic Ritual is active, each Soul Shard spent on a damaging spell reduces its duration by 1 sec.

When Diabolic Ritual expires you gain Demonic Art, causing your next Hand of Gul'dan to summon an Overlord, Mother of Chaos, or Pit Lord that unleashes a devastating attack against your enemies.
Enemies damaged by your Overlord have their souls cloven, increasing damage taken by you and your pets by 5% for 15 sec.
Demonic Art increases the damage of your next Hand of Gul'dan by 100% and reduces its cast time by 50%.

Mother of Chaos empowers your next Shadow Bolt to become Infernal Bolt.

 Infernal Bolt
Hurl a bolt enveloped in the infernal flames of the abyss, dealing 974,704 Fire damage to your enemy target and generating 3 Soul Shards.
You always gain the benefit of Soulburn when casting Demonic Circle: Teleport, increasing your movement speed by 50% and making you immune to snares and roots for 6 sec.
Summon Demonic Tyrant grants Diabolic Ritual and reduces its duration by 3 sec.
Unending Resolve heals you for 30% of your maximum health over 10 sec.
Fire damage increased by 2% and damage dealt by your demons is increased by 2%.
Summon Demonic Tyrant is empowered, dealing 70% increased damage and increasing the damage of your demons by 20% while active.
Hand of Gul'dan deals 15% increased damage for each Soul Shard spent.

Summoning a Pit Lord causes your next Hand of Gul'dan to become Ruination.

 Ruination
Call down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing 1 million Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summoning 3 Wild Imps.

Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.

Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.2% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 90%.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.
Reduces the damage dealt by Burning Rush by 10%. Burning Rush increases your movement speed by an additional 20%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

Curse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Curse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%.

Increases you and your pets' maximum health by 5%.

Generates 1 Soul Shard.

Increases all damage done by your pet by 4%.

Summons a Felguard who attacks the target for 17 sec that deals 125% increased damage.

This Felguard will stun and interrupt their target when summoned.
When your Wild Imps expire or die, your other demons are inspired and gain 1% additional damage, stacking up to 10 times.

Hand of Gul'dan has a 15% chance to burn its target for 93,141 additional Shadowflame damage every 2 sec for 6 sec.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Umbral Blaze.
Summon Demonic Tyrant empowers 5 additional Wild Imps and deals 10% increased damage for each demon he empowers.
Shadow Bolt and Demonbolt have a 20% chance to make your next Call Dreadstalkers cost 2 fewer Soul Shards and have no cast time.

When Demonbolt consumes a Demonic Core it inflicts impending doom upon the target, dealing 338,854 Shadow damage to enemies within 10 yds of its target after 20 sec or when removed. Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.

Each Soul Shard spent on Hand of Gul'dan reduces the duration of Doom by 1 sec.
Summon a Vilefiend to fight for you for the next 15 sec.
Your Felguard deals 20% additional damage. Soul Strike now deals 25% of its damage to nearby enemies.
Increases the damage of Doom by 30% and Doom summons 1 Wild Imp when it expires.
Increases Vilefiend damage by 20% and your Vilefiend's Bile Spit now applies Wicked Maw.
Your Dreadstalkers deal 50% increased damage while your Vilefiend is active.
When Doom expires, you have a chance to summon a Doomguard that casts 5 Doom Bolts before departing. Each Doom Bolt deals 282,616 Shadow damage.
Wicked Maw causes the target to take 20% additional Shadow damage from your demons.

 Infernal Presence
Cloaked in the ever-burning flames of the abyss, dealing 15,053 Fire damage to enemies within 10 yards every 0.8 sec.

 Infernal Bolt

Summon Demonic Tyrant grants Diabolic Ritual and reduces its duration by 3 sec.
Unending Resolve heals you for 30% of your maximum health over 10 sec.
Fire damage increased by 2% and damage dealt by your demons is increased by 2%.
Summon Demonic Tyrant is empowered, dealing 70% increased damage and increasing the damage of your demons by 20% while active.
Hand of Gul'dan deals 15% increased damage for each Soul Shard spent.

Summoning a Pit Lord causes your next Hand of Gul'dan to become Ruination.

 Ruination
Call down a demon-infested meteor from the depths of the Twisting Nether, dealing 1 million Chaos damage on impact to all enemies within 8 yds of the target and summoning 3 Wild Imps.

Damage is reduced beyond 8 targets.
Casting a curse now applies Corruption and Agony to your target, but curses now costs 1 Soul Shard.
Unstable Affliction can now be applied to up to 3 targets, but its damage is reduced by 45%.
Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Incubus, Succubus, Felhunter, or Felguard Summon spell is free and has its casting time reduced by 90%.

Increases your movement speed by 50%, but also damages you for 4% of your maximum health every 1 sec. Movement impairing effects may not reduce you below 100% of normal movement speed. Lasts until canceled.

Your Soul Leech absorption now passively recharges at a rate of 0.2% of maximum health every 1 sec, and may now absorb up to 10% of maximum health.

Increases your armor by 90%.

When Soul Leech absorbs damage, 10% of damage taken is absorbed and spread out over 5 sec.

Reduces damage taken by 3.0%.
Reduces the damage dealt by Burning Rush by 10%. Burning Rush increases your movement speed by an additional 20%.

Grants access to the following abilities:

Curse of Tongues:
Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30% for 1 min.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.

Curse of Exhaustion:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 12 sec.

Curses: A warlock can only have one Curse active per target.
Horrifies an enemy target into fleeing, incapacitating for 3 sec and healing you for 20% of maximum health.
Stamina increased by 10%.
Increases the attack speed of your primary pet by 5%.
Increases the damage done by your primary pet by 5%.
Your Healthstone heals you for an additional 10% of your maximum health. Any party or raid member using a Healthstone also heals you for that amount.
Creates a demonic gateway between two locations. Activating the gateway transports the user to the other gateway. Each player can use a Demonic Gateway only once per 90 sec.
When you use a Healthstone, gain 8% Leech for 20 sec.
Sacrifices 20% of your current health to shield you for 200% of the sacrificed health plus an additional 229,745 for 20 sec. Usable while suffering from control impairing effects.
Unending Resolve reduces damage taken by an additional 15%.
Stuns all enemies within 8 yds for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Dark Pact by 15 sec.
Reduces the cast time of Soulstone and Create Healthstone by 50%.
Soul Leech also heals you for 15% and your pet for 100% of the absorption it grants.

Healthstones you conjure for yourself are now Demonic Healthstones and can be used multiple times in combat. Demonic Healthstones cannot be traded.

 Demonic Healthstone
Instantly restores 35% health. 60 sec cooldown.

Summons a Soulkeeper that consumes all Tormented Souls you've collected, blasting nearby enemies for 5,386 Chaos damage per soul consumed over 8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets and only one Soulkeeper can be active at a time.

You collect Tormented Souls from each target you kill and occasionally escaped souls you previously collected.

Afflicts one target with 671,621 Shadow damage over 16 sec. 

If dispelled, deals 2.3 million damage to the dispeller and silences them for 4 sec.
Agony's damage starts at 4 stacks and may now ramp up to 18 stacks.

Embeds a demon seed in the enemy target that will explode after 9.6 sec, dealing 55,897 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yards and applying Corruption to them.

The seed will detonate early if the target is hit by other detonations, or takes 45,949 damage from your spells.
Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul deal an additional 5% damage.

Corruption is now permanent and deals 15% increased damage.

Duration reduced to 24 sec against players.
Malefic Rapture damage increased by 8%. Corruption damage increased by 20%.

Corruption damage has a chance to cause your next Shadow Bolt or Drain Soul to deal 25% increased damage. 

Shadow Bolt is instant cast and Drain Soul channels 50% faster when affected.

Refreshing Agony with 10 or less seconds remaining deals 149,872 Shadow damage to its target and enemies within 10 yards.

Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Reduces the cast time of Shadow Bolt by 15% and increases its damage by 40%.

A ghostly soul haunts the target, dealing 456,605 Shadow damage and increasing your damage dealt to the target by 10% for 18 sec.

If the target dies, Haunt's cooldown is reset.
Corruption damage is increased by 15%, and each time it deals damage any of your Curses active on the target are extended by 0.5 sec.

Summons a Darkglare from the Twisting Nether that extends the duration of your damage over time effects on all enemies by 8 sec.

The Darkglare will serve you for 20 sec, blasting its target for 93,802 Shadow damage, increased by 45% for every damage over time effect you have active on their current target.
Increases the damage of your Darkglare by 70%. When Darkglare extends damage over time effects it also sears affected targets for 744,251 Shadow damage.
Increases critical strike damage dealt by Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction by 30%.
Your Agony, Corruption, and Unstable Affliction deal damage 15% faster.
Unstable Affliction deals 20% increased damage.
Malefic Rapture deals 40% increased damage to targets suffering from Unstable Affliction.
Increases Malefic Rapture damage by 5% and reduces its cast time by 10%.

Unleash wicked magic upon your target's soul, dealing 1.8 million Shadow damage over 3 sec.

Deals 10% increased damage, up to 30%, per damage over time effect you have active on the target.

Increases Drain Life healing by 30% while your health is at or below 35% health. 

Damage done by your Agony, Corruption, Unstable Affliction, and Malefic Rapture is increased by 10% when your target is at or below 35% health.
